item.title: Thousands protest in Georgia as new president sworn in
item.description: A Georgian Dream aligned president takes office even as his pro-West predecessor refuses to step down.

item.title: Video captures moments before South Korea plane crash
item.description: The Jeju Air flight landing at Muan Airport had 181 passengers on board when it crashed off the runway.

item.title: As Putin reaches 25 years in power, has he 'taken care of Russia'?
item.description: Over a quarter of a century in power we've seen many different Putins, says the BBC's Russia editor.

item.title: Putin apologises over Azerbaijan plane crash, without saying Russia at fault
item.description: Russia's leader apologises over the downing of an Azerbaijani plane in Russian airspace - without directly taking blame.

item.title: Toddler nearly runs off cliff at Hawaii volcano
item.description: The little boy wandered off from his family and "ran straight toward the 400ft cliff edge" of the Kilauea volcano.
